title: (x) Products Rewind - Rhode {Dav}
content:
Hello type geniuses!

I am working off of a site comp that was sent to me by my boss - he flattened the file. I went back to him and asked for the type he used and he had flattened the original as well! The type is below - thank you so much!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [shawn-typeid.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024011142/http:/typophile.com/files/shawn-typeid.gif) | 20.45 KB |

 [‹ (x) "Umberto Eco" geometric sans - Gotham {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024011142/http:/typophile.com/node/13153 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) estate agency font - Friz Quadrata {Mike} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024011142/http:/typophile.com/node/13179 "Go to next forum topic")
author: shawn harris

comments.content: I believe this is [The Font Bureau, Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024011142/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%252BFont%252BBureau%25252C%252BInc.)’s Rhode, but I need to check.

beautiful!! thank you so much!

shawn
